name: Federal funds outside of state treasury
text:
Notwithstanding chapter 38, the corporation may establish and manage federal funds outside of the state treasury to be used for federal housing programs.  The corporation shall invest such funds in permitted investments in accordance with chapter 36. [L 2003, c 36, §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  Notwithstanding chapter 38, the administration may establish and manage federal funds outside of the state treasury to be used for federal housing programs.  The administration shall invest such funds in permitted investments in accordance with chapter 36. [L 2003, c 36, §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(a)]
